ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.content:
For NABTAH to be a reference in the field of therapeutic natural care in the Arab world.
We aspire to be the first choice for every woman seeking effective medical care that touches her beauty, respects her health, and reflects the purity of her personality.

whyNabta.title: What Makes NABTAH Special
features: Direct medical supervision over production and development
Formulas based on scientific studies and precise testing
High quality with professional manufacturing standards
Free from exaggeration… full of real results

ourPromise.title: Our Promise to You
ourPromise.content:
Every product that bears the NABTAH name is our commitment to your beauty and well-being.
We promise to continue offering honest, effective, and science-based products — because we believe that a woman who chooses NABTAH chooses the best.

sales.title: Sales
sales.content:
At NABTAH, we don’t just sell a product — we offer a real solution, grounded in science and tested by specialists.
Our goal goes beyond completing a purchase. We aim to build loyalty that stems from trust — trust created by results you can feel and experiences worth repeating.
Every happy client is a partner in our success… and a natural promoter, because the results speak for themselves.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.content:
At Nabta, every product goes through a meticulous journey before it reaches you:
From studying ingredients in the lab and testing their effectiveness, to quality control in every production batch.
features: Free from harmful and irritating substances
Manufactured with professional standards inside Egypt
manufacturing.finalNote: We combine science with nature to create a product you can trust — and love.

executive.title: Executive Management
executive.content1: Nabta is led by a team of experts in chemistry, pharmacy, and scientific cosmetology — professionals who believe that every product must offer real value to the customer, not just a pretty package.
executive.content2:
We never release a product unless we’d trust it for our own families.
Transparency, quality, and effectiveness are the principles we never compromise.

about.title: About Us
about.description:
Nabta was not a coincidence… but a dream that grew from science and blossomed in the embrace of nature.

It was founded by Nihal Basyouni, an Egyptian clinical pharmacist, after more than 3 years of research, planning, and decision-making. She was not only seeking to launch a new product but to build an effective, luxurious feminine therapeutic experience — reflecting a deeper vision of true beauty.

She was joined on this journey by Dr. Abdullah Al-Qursh, the Egyptian doctor who believed with her that care is not a luxury… but a right every woman deserves when it is presented scientifically, with details that pulse with love.

Thus, NABTAH was born — a brand carrying a promise in its heart:
That care can make you feel powerful, pampered with elegance, and deliver results that truly resemble you.

In every product, you will find:
A pure formula designed by a specialized medical team,
An unforgettable soft texture,
A scent that resembles your favorite moment,
And packaging that opens a small door to luxury.

Because at Nabta, we don’t sell a product.
We grant you a care journey you deserve in every detail.
Nabta… from you, to you.

customerService.paragraph2: Whether you have a question, a note, or just need help with your skincare routine, we are by your side every step of the way.
customerService.paragraph3: With NABTAH, every customer has a voice — and a priority.

shippingPolicy.title: Shipping Policy
shippingPolicy.details: At NABTAH, every order goes through meticulous steps of packaging, wrapping, and inspection to ensure it reaches you in perfect condition. We offer fast and secure shipping to all governorates within 2 to 5 business days, with instant order confirmation and continuous follow-up until delivery.
shippingPolicy.note: Note: Due to the nature of personal care products, we do not accept returns or exchanges after delivery, to protect your safety and maintain your trust. We appreciate your understanding and your commitment—just like ours—to the highest standards of safety and hygiene.

exchangePolicy.title: Exchange Policy
exchangePolicy.paragraph1: Your satisfaction is our priority. We treat every order as if it were the first, with the utmost care and attention. We ensure all products are carefully inspected and packaged before leaving our warehouse.
exchangePolicy.paragraph2: However, in the rare case that a product arrives with a manufacturing defect or damage during shipping, we’re happy to replace it under the following conditions:
exchangePolicy.bullet1: Please contact us within 48 hours of receiving your order.
exchangePolicy.bullet2: Include clear photos showing the issue.
exchangePolicy.bullet3: After reviewing the case, a replacement will be shipped within 4–7 business days.
exchangePolicy.end: We promise you a worry-free experience… because every detail matters to us!
